scripts.sh:db: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.dev run --rm db bash
scripts.sh:pgadmin: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.dev run --rm pgadmin bash
scripts.sh:backend: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.dev run --rm backend bash
scripts.sh:frontend: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.dev run --rm frontend bash
